categories: Outer Limits Over-the-Calf Padded Light Cushi
description: Performance fit for a full day of powder turns. Fine-gauge merino wool provides warmth without bulk and has natural antimicrobial properties.Made of high-density knit merino wool with nylon and spandex for durability and fit.All weather performance: Warm in winter, cool enough for spring turns.True seamless construction makes them irresistibly comfortable.High-density cushioning underfoot and on the shin for comfort in ski boots.Darn Tough sources their wool from non-mulesed sheep.
name: Darn Tough Outer Limits Over-the-Calf Padded Light Cushioning Socks - Unisex
